Banner.Description: As a Full Stack Software Engineer with over 6+ years of experience , I deeply understand both front-end and back-end technologies. My experience spans the entire software development life cycle, from gathering requirements and designing solutions to deployment and maintenance.
MainTech.Title: Main Skills & Education
SecondTech.Title: Well known
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: My expertise in front-end development includes creating interactive, responsive user interfaces using technologies such as HTML5, CSS3 and Angular. I have a keen eye for design and usability and am adept at converting designs into fully functional web pages that provide a seamless user experience.

I have extensive experience developing scalable and efficient APIs and services on the back-end using technologies like .NET Core and Node.js. Likewise, I am proficient in optimizing database queries and designing database schemas, with a strong background in SQL server databases and MongoDB.
In addition to web development, my skill set includes mobile app development. I have hands-on experience in building cross-platform mobile applications using Android and Flutter.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
Description: Planned and managed the phases of the development life cycle of the software.
Managed a distributed team of 5 developers to build scalable a social platform using React, Node.js, and MongoDB, achieving thousands of active users within the first year.
Create Scrum ceremonies & plannings.
Analyzed feedback data provided by end-users, architects, and tech leads.
Development of robust and scalable mobile applications using Android with Kotlin, and Flutter.
Responsible for code reviews and team code quality.

Provide knowledge transfer sessions among the team.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full-Stack Software Engineer

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Pokemon
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Pokemon search engine that uses the pokeapi. Object-oriented programming was used to organize the information of the pokemons along with their respective image.

OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a two-column split page to be used as a 'Coming soon page'. Scheduled to be a fully responsive design. It has a form field to subscribe by email.

OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page that has a minimal design, listing four features on four cards. Input animations are done with angular animations.
